title: STAT+: Novo Nordisk Foundation gives $850M to nonprofit to help commercialize research in Europe
description: The Novo Nordisk Foundation announced it was giving an additional $850 million to an institute to help commercialize biomedical research in Europe.
content: The Novo Nordisk Foundation announced it was giving an additional $850 million to an institute to help commercialize biomedical research in Europe.
